title: 18K Gold Enamel Bubble Initial Necklace
short_description: Our 18K Gold Enamel Bubble Initial Necklace gives the classic initial necklace an updated spin. A tiny gold letter of your choice sits on a bright enamel background, providing a pop of color in every stack. Available in A-Z and nine different colors, you're sure to find the perfect piece for you. Even better? This piece is crafted with 18K gold plated sterling silver, ensuring you'll be able to wear it for a lifetime.
